Posted on April 25, 2025

Press Release 4.25.2025

Mayor Maribel Guerrero and the Board of Aldermen of the Town of Rancho Viejo Announce a Groundbreaking Ceremony

Mayor Guerrero cordially invites all residents to the groundbreaking ceremony for the Town of Rancho Viejo’s new Pavilion and Multi-Use Facility.

Wednesday, April 30, 2025, at 5:30 PM at the Rancho Viejo Kids’ Park 115 Angelitas Avenue Rancho Viejo, Texas
